rows.label: tlk41400072_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I believe that one day, the war will
come to an end.

rows.label: tlk41400072_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I believe that in a peaceful Alst, we refugees
will return to our homes and live.

rows.label: tlk41400072_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Wishing for such a time to come,
I will spend today cheerfully as well.

rows.label: tlk41400072_03_msg0004
rows.name:
You, who possess a Blade, I ask you as well
to not stray from the path, for the sake of
world peace.
